title: ghost game bug, how long do i wait?
body: i just got out of a league game and skipped waiting for stats because it had already been about a minute. it then said reconnect and when i clicked it, my  screen went black. i restarted league and my pc and nothing has fixed it. from what i've read, i have to wait for a bit while the servers "clear" the game. how long does one usually wait for this? thanks.
